Npc0411:
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 411 623]
 [WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[FREEZE_NPC 411]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½What a horrible nightmare.[PAUSE 20]  I somehow woke up.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS],[PAUSE 15] let's be friends again.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Please answer me.  I promise to be good.[PAUSE 60] ...uh ...okay?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[UNFREEZE_NPC 411]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[FREEZE_NPC 411]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½Hah!  I lied![PAUSE 20]  See you, sucker![WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[UNFREEZE_NPC 411]
[CLR_FLAG POKEY_OUTSIDE_HH_HQ]
[RESET_OSS_FLAG]
[END]
